report.name: x_fact_att_ord

userParameter.name: P_FILTRE
userParameter.comment: Sert à afficher les critères de selection

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: SELECT RPAD(f.numfact,15,' ') numfact, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fdeppole),' '),7,' ') fdeppole, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fmontht,'FM999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,'),TO_CHAR(0,'FM0D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,')),12,' ') fmontht, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fmontttc,'FM999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,'),TO_CHAR(0,'FM0D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,')),12,' ') fmontttc, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.ftva,'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,'),TO_CHAR(0,'FM0D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,')),9,' ') ftva, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fmoiacompta,'DD/MM/YYYY'),' '),10,' ') fmoiacompta, RPAD(SUBSTR(NVL(l.lcodcompta,' '),1,7),7,' ') fcodcompta, RPAD(NVL(f.numcont,' '),27,' ') numcont, RPAD(NVL(f.socfact,' '),4,' ') socfact, RPAD(NVL(s.soclib,' '),25,' ') soclib, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(l.ident),' '),5,' ') ident, RPAD(NVL(r.rnom,' '),30,' ') nom_ress, RPAD(NVL(r1.rnom,' '),30,' ') nom_CP, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(l.lmoisprest,'DD/MM/YYYY'),' '),10,' ') lmoisprest, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(l.lmontht,'FM999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,'),TO_CHAR(0,'FM0D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,')),12,' ') lmontht, LPAD(TO_CHAR(f.datfact,'DD/MM/YYYY'),10,' ') datfact, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fenrcompta,'DD/MM/YYYY'),' '),10,' ') fenrcompta, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fdatsai,'DD/MM/YYYY'),' '),10,' ') fdatsai, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fdatmaj,'DD/MM/YYYY'),' '),10,' ') fdatmaj, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.faccsec,'DD/MM/YYYY'),' '),10,' ') faccsec, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fdatrecep,'DD/MM/YYYY'),' '),10,' ') fdatrecep , LPAD(NVL(c.CAV,0),3,'0') ccav FROM FACTURE F, LIGNE_FACT L, CONTRAT C, RESSOURCE R, SOCIETE S, STRUCT_INFO SI, SITU_RESS sr, RESSOURCE r1 WHERE F.SOCFACT = L.SOCFACT AND F.TYPFACT = L.TYPFACT AND F.DATFACT = L.DATFACT AND F.NUMFACT = L.NUMFACT AND F.SOCCONT = C.SOCCONT AND F.NUMCONT = C.NUMCONT AND F.CAV = C.CAV AND F.SOCFACT = S.SOCCODE AND F.FDEPPOLE = SI.CODSG AND L.IDENT = R.IDENT AND F.NUMCONT IS NOT NULL --AND ( f.faccsec IS NULL OR f.fregcompta IS NULL) --recupere le nom du chef de projet AND l.ident=sr.ident AND (l.lmoisprest>=sr.datsitu OR sr.datsitu IS NULL) AND (l.lmoisprest<=sr.datdep OR sr.datdep IS NULL) AND sr.cpident=r1.ident &P_WHERE UNION ALL SELECT RPAD(f.numfact,15,' ') numfact, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fdeppole),' '),7,' ') fdeppole, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fmontht,'FM999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,'),TO_CHAR(0,'FM0D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,')),12,' ') fmontht, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fmontttc,'FM999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,'),TO_CHAR(0,'FM0D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,')),12,' ') fmontttc, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.ftva,'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,'),TO_CHAR(0,'FM0D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,')),9,' ') ftva, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fmoiacompta,'DD/MM/YYYY'),' '),10,' ') fmoiacompta, RPAD(SUBSTR(NVL(l.lcodcompta,' '),1,7),7,' ') fcodcompta, RPAD(NVL(f.numcont,' '),27,' ') numcont, RPAD(NVL(f.socfact,' '),4,' ') socfact, RPAD(NVL(s.soclib,' '),25,' ') soclib, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(l.ident),' '),5,' ') ident, RPAD(NVL(r.rnom,' '),30,' ') nom_ress, RPAD(NVL(r1.rnom,' '),30,' ') nom_CP, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(l.lmoisprest,'DD/MM/YYYY'),' '),10,' ') lmoisprest, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(l.lmontht,'FM999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,'),TO_CHAR(0,'FM0D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.,')),12,' ') lmontht, LPAD(TO_CHAR(f.datfact,'DD/MM/YYYY'),10,' ') datfact, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fenrcompta,'DD/MM/YYYY'),' '),10,' ') fenrcompta, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fdatsai,'DD/MM/YYYY'),' '),10,' ') fdatsai, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fdatmaj,'DD/MM/YYYY'),' '),10,' ') fdatmaj, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.faccsec,'DD/MM/YYYY'),' '),10,' ') faccsec, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(f.fdatrecep,'DD/MM/YYYY'),' '),10,' ') fdatrecep , LPAD(NVL(f.CAV,0),3,'0') ccav FROM FACTURE F, LIGNE_FACT L, RESSOURCE R, SOCIETE S, STRUCT_INFO SI, SITU_RESS sr, RESSOURCE r1 WHERE F.SOCFACT = L.SOCFACT AND F.TYPFACT = L.TYPFACT AND F.DATFACT = L.DATFACT AND F.NUMFACT = L.NUMFACT AND F.SOCFACT = S.SOCCODE AND F.FDEPPOLE = SI.CODSG AND L.IDENT = R.IDENT AND F.NUMCONT IS NULL -- AND ( f.faccsec IS NULL OR f.fregcompta IS NULL) --recupere le nom du chef de projet AND l.ident=sr.ident AND (l.lmoisprest>=sr.datsitu OR sr.datsitu IS NULL) AND (l.lmoisprest<=sr.datdep OR sr.datdep IS NULL) AND sr.cpident=r1.ident &P_WHERE2 order by 11, 12,13 asc
dataSource.comment: Deux selects : s1 union s2 s1 : rammerne les factures avec contrat (celles qu'ont un contrat, leur filiale est compara au filiale d'utilisateur) s2 : les factures sans contrat

function.name: afterpform
rtrimetoile
